{{cpp/io/basic_istream/title|peek}}
{{cpp/io/basic_istream/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
int_type peek();
}}

Behaves as {{named req|UnformattedInputFunction}}. After constructing and testing the sentry object, reads the next character from the input stream without extracting it. 

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
If {{c|good() {{==}} true}}, returns the next character as obtained by {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;sgetc()}}.

Otherwise, returns {{c|Traits::eof()}}.

===Exceptions===
{{include|cpp/io/stream_exceptions}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::istringstream s1("Hello, world.");
    char c1 = s1.peek();
    char c2 = s1.get();
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Peeked: " &lt;&lt; c1 &lt;&lt; " got: " &lt;&lt; c2 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Peeked: H got: H
}}
